name: Galavaders Mobile
description:
READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!!

Created 12/15/2020

A simple 80's style shooter game

Best Played on PC

Use WASD or arrow keys on PC, select Mobile Mode in settings on mobile.

Space to shoot on PC or shoot on mobile.

P to pause (Only on PC currently)

I'm sorry this took so long, but I finally got around to fixing VS mode and Infinite. I also updated the sprites so they are less blurry.

VS mode can only be played on PC, WS to move player 1. D to shield. A to shoot

Up and down arrow to move player 2. Left arrow to shield. Right arrow to shoot

Join me on Discord!

Created by Ragnarok Games

Submit your high scores at galavaders@gmail.com

The download is FREE, but cannot be played offline.
